John, any idea in which code this happend. It would really help to track this down.

Looking at the code this happens if one of the method parameters is null.
However this can only happen if a null element is part of the array return from
IMethodBinding#getParameterTypes(). 

The type parameters of the first argument are fetched in "isEqualMethod", the
onces of the second argument in "findOverriddenMethodInType".

Moving to JDT/Core since the array return form
IMethodBinding#getParameterTypes() should not contain null elements.

I had just opened Workspace.java in org.eclipse.core.resources.  I don't think I
had made any modifications to the file, so it will be the same as what's in HEAD
now.  At the time the error happened, I tried closing and reopening the editor,
and didn't get the error again.
Need to get a testcase for it, please reopen if you find any.
This is a dup of bug 85095.

Thx Markus for the info :-)

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 85095 ***
